extension.name: Revolution Slider Module
extension.author: Marius Hogas
extension.license: Commercial module, only available with Kallyas Template.
extension.description:
This module is based on the Revolution Slider by ThemePunch and converted as a Joomla Module by Marius Hogas. Revolution Slider is a jQuery plugin that has awesome effects. Keep in mind this module is a bit hard to configure and there should be at least a middle knowledge level.
How this module works:
  • Create a new category
  • Go to Article Manager and here you have to create articles which basically are the slides. The images etc. are actually layers with different effects. Each element is a shortcode with different parameters.
  • In this module, select the category feed and set the final parameters.

field.name: catid
field.label: Slides Category
field.description: If you choosed Category Component in the Slider source option, please choose the category that has the slides.

field.name: count
field.label: Slides Count
field.description: The number of slides to display (the default is 5)

field.name: ordering
field.label: Ordering
field.description: Recently Added First: order the slides using their creation date // Recently Modified First: order the slides using their modification date // Recently Published First: order the slides using their publication date. // Recently Touched First: order the slides using their modification or creation dates.

field.name: delay
field.label: Delay time (ms)
field.description: The time one slide stays on the screen in Milliseconds (Default: 9000)

field.name: onHoverStop
field.label: Stop on hover?
field.description: Stop Banner Timet at Hover on Slide on/off
